result.content:

 Set Up: .FitNesse.SuiteAcceptanceTests.SetUp (edit)
Import
fitnesse.fixtures

SetUp

When testing a table, if the first cell of the table does not refer to a class in the classpath, then the following message should appear in that cell:

Could not find fixture: fixtureName.


  • Here is a fitnesse page that should generate the error
The !path must point to fitnesse.jar
Action fixture
start Page builder
enter attributes Test=true
enter line !path ./classes
enter line !path ./fitnesse.jar
enter line !|NoSuch|
enter page NoSuchFixturePage

Response Requester
uri status?
NoSuchFixturePage?test 200

  • The error message should show up in the response

Response examiner
type pattern matches? contents?
contents Could not find fixture: NoSuch true   HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Server: FitNesse-v20100403 Transfer-Encoding: chunked Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 951 <!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd"> <html> <head> <title>Test Results: NoSuchFixturePage</title> <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/files/css/fitnesse.css" media="screen"/> <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/files/css/fitnesse_print.css" media="print"/> <script src="/files/javascript/fitnesse.js" type="text/javascript"></script> </head> <body> <div class="sidebar"> <div class="art_niche" onclick="document.location='FrontPage'"></div> <div class="actions"> <!--Test button--> <a href="NoSuchFixturePage?test" accesskey="t">Test</a> <div class="nav_break"> </div> <!--Edit button--> <a href="NoSuchFixturePage?edit" accesskey="e">Edit</a> <div class="nav_break"> </div> <!--Properties button--> <a href="NoSuchFixturePage?properties" accesskey="p">Properties</a> <div class="nav_break"> </div> <!--Refactor button--> <a href="NoSuchFixturePage?refactor" accesskey="r">Refactor</a> <div class="nav_break"> </div> <!--Where Used button--> <a href="NoSuchFixturePage?whereUsed" accesskey="w">Where Used</a> <div class="nav_break"> </div> <!--Search button--> <a href="?searchForm" accesskey="s">Search</a> <div class="nav_break"> </div> <!--Files button--> <a href="/files" accesskey="f">Files</a> <div class="nav_break"> </div> <!--Versions button--> <a href="NoSuchFixturePage?versions" accesskey="v">Versions</a> <div class="nav_break"> </div> <!--Recent Changes button--> <a href="/RecentChanges" accesskey="">Recent Changes</a> <div class="nav_break"> </div> <!--User Guide button--> <a href=".FitNesse.UserGuide" accesskey="">User Guide</a> <div class="nav_break"> </div> <!--Test History button--> <a href="?testHistory" accesskey="">Test History</a> <div class="nav_break"> </div> <div class="nav_break"> </div> </div> </div> <div class="mainbar"> <div class="header"> <br/><a href="/NoSuchFixturePage" class="page_title">NoSuchFixturePage</a> <br/> <span class="page_type">Test Results</span>  <a style="font-size:small;" href="NoSuchFixturePage?pageHistory"> [history]</a> </div> <div class="main"><div id="test-summary">Running Tests ...</div> e3 <div id="stop-test"> <a href="#" onclick="doSilentRequest('?responder=stoptest&id=1')"> <img src="/files/images/stop.gif"/> </a> <br/> <a href="#" onclick="doSilentRequest('?responder=stoptest&id=1')">Stop Test</a> </div> 103 <span class="meta">classpath: ./classes</span><br/><span class="meta">classpath: ./fitnesse.jar</span><br/><table border="1" cellspacing="0"> <tr><td class="error">NoSuch<hr/> <span class="fit_label">Could not find fixture: NoSuch.</span></td> </tr> </table> 46 <script>document.getElementById("stop-test").innerHTML = "";</script> cb <script>document.getElementById("test-summary").innerHTML = "<strong>Assertions:</strong> 0 right, 0 wrong, 0 ignored, 1 exceptions";document.getElementById("test-summary").className = "error";</script> c4 <div id="execution-status"> <a href="ErrorLogs.NoSuchFixturePage"><img src="/files/images/executionStatus/ok.gif"/> </a> <br/> <a href="ErrorLogs.NoSuchFixturePage">Tests Executed OK</a> </div> 1a <br/><div class="footer"> 7 </div> 21 </div> </div> </body> </html> 0 Exit-Code: 1

Response requester
uri contents?
ErrorLogs.NoSuchFixturePage   
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Length: 4269
Connection: close
Server: FitNesse-v20100403
Cache-Control: max-age=0
Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8

<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.01//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd">
<html>
	<head>
		<title>ErrorLogs.NoSuchFixturePage</title>
		<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/files/css/fitnesse.css" media="screen"/>
		<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="/files/css/fitnesse_print.css" media="print"/>
		<script src="/files/javascript/fitnesse.js" type="text/javascript"></script>
	</head>
	<body>
		<div class="sidebar">
			<div class="art_niche" onclick="document.location='FrontPage'"></div>
			<div class="actions">
				<!--Edit button-->
				<a href="ErrorLogs.NoSuchFixturePage?edit" accesskey="e">Edit</a>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>

				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
				<!--Where Used button-->

				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
				<!--Search button-->
				<a href="?searchForm" accesskey="s">Search</a>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
				<!--Files button-->
				<a href="/files" accesskey="f">Files</a>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
				<!--Versions button-->
				<a href="ErrorLogs.NoSuchFixturePage?versions" accesskey="v">Versions</a>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
				<!--Recent Changes button-->
				<a href="/RecentChanges" accesskey="">Recent Changes</a>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
				<!--User Guide button-->
				<a href=".FitNesse.UserGuide" accesskey="">User Guide</a>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
				<!--Test History button-->
				<a href="?testHistory" accesskey="">Test History</a>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
				<div class="nav_break"> </div>
			</div>
		</div>
		<div class="mainbar">
			<div class="header">
				<a href="/ErrorLogs">ErrorLogs</a>.
				<br/><span class="page_title">NoSuchFixturePage</span>
<a style="font-size:small;" onclick="popup('addChildPopup')"> [add child]</a>			</div>
			<div class="main"><h3>fit</h3><table border="1" cellspacing="0">
<tr><td><b>Date: </b></td>
<td>2:18:08 PM (IDT) on Thursday, July 8, 2010</td>
</tr>
<tr><td><b>Test Page: </b></td>
<td><a href="NoSuchFixturePage">.NoSuchFixturePage</a></td>
</tr>
<tr><td><b>Command: </b></td>
<td>java -cp fitnesse.jar:./classes:./fitnesse.jar fit.FitServer Macintosh-8.local 9123 1</td>
</tr>
<tr><td><b>Exit code: </b></td>
<td>1</td>
</tr>
<tr><td><b>Time elapsed: </b></td>
<td>0.526 seconds</td>
</tr>
</table>
<br/><div class="footer">
</div>
<div id="addChildPopup" class="popup_window">
  <div class="popup_title">Add Child Page to NoSuchFixturePage</div>
  <div class="popup_content">
    <form action="ErrorLogs.NoSuchFixturePage" method="get">
      <input type="hidden" name="responder" value="addChild"/>
      <table style="white-space:normal" border="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%" height="100%">
        <tr>
          <td>
            <input type="radio" name="pageType" value="Normal"/>Normal<br/>
            <input type="radio" name="pageType" value="Test"/>Test<br/>
            <input type="radio" name="pageType" value="Suite"/>Suite<br/>
            <input type="radio" name="pageType" value="Default" checked="checked"/>Default<br/>
          </td>
          <td>
            <table border="0" cellspacing="0" width="100%">
              <tr>
                <td><label for="childName">Name</label></td>
                <td><input size="50" id="childName" type="text" name="name"/></td>
              </tr>
              <tr>
                <td><label for="childContent">Content</label></td>
                <td><input size="50" id="childContent" type="text" name="content" value="!contents"/></td>
              </tr>
            </table>
          </td>
        </tr>
        <tr>
          <td></td>
          <td>
            <input TYPE="button" VALUE="Cancel" onClick="popdown('addChildPopup')"/>
            <input value="Add" type="submit"/>
          </td>
        </tr>
      </table>
    </form>
  </div>
</div></div>
		</div>
	</body>
</html>
